verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He gives more grace when the burdens grow greater. He sends more strength when the labors increase. To added affliction, He adds His mercy, To multiplied trials, His multiplied peace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we have exhausted our store of endurance, When our strength has failed ere the day is half done, When we’ve reached the end of our human resources, Our Father’s full giving has only begun.{/lang-eng}
